attributes.action: Prevent lorries from overtaking on Motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lorries should be confined to the left-hand ('slow') lane, and be prevented from overtaking (except where a designated 'crawler lane' exists, in which case they may overtake lorries in the 'crawler lane' only).
This will a) reduce congestion, as lorries will not be able to block lanes 1 and 2 whilst passing each other at almost-zero speed difference, and b) increase road safety as they will be kept out of the faster lanes, and away from the central reservation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
